Package bomberman.controller.handler

Interface HandlerI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigStartHandler, Controller, GameStartHandler, PauseHandler
    public interface HandlerI
    Subclasses has to be able to handle Commands.
    Author:
    Felix Bachmann

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void handle​(Command comm)
      Handle a command.

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        void handle​(Command comm)
     throws NoHandlerForThisCommandException
        Handle a command.
        Parameters:
        comm - the command to handle
        Throws:
        NoHandlerForThisCommandException - may be thrown when the conmmand can not be handled because there is no game set. Avoid this by calling Controller.setGame(bomberman.model.Game)
